summary: Erkeil's Lord of the Dead finally fixed and fully playable.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=violet]* * * IMPORTANT NOTE * * *[/color]

[i]I'm not the Author of this mod (Erkeil), who gave free permission to player community to use his assets.
[/i][/b][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=#ffff00][i]I've only fixed some annoying bugs (principally the lack of new spells into necrowarlock loots)
and make it more compatible and install-friendly.[/i][/color]
[i]Now the mod is fully playable![/i]

[/b][b][color=violet]* * * * * * * * * * * * *[/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][color=violet][size=3][b] * * *[/b][/size][/color][/font][font=Trebuchet MS]

[/font][/center][font=Trebuchet MS]
[size=2][b][size=3]1) DESCRIPTION
1.1) NEW NECROMANCY PERKS & POWERS
1.2) NEW NECROMANCY SPELLS
2) COMPATIBILITY
3) REQUIREMENTS
4) INSTALL WITH MOD ORGANIZER?
3) CREDITS
[/size]

[/b][/size][size=3][b][color=#00ffff][b][color=#00ffff][color=#c27ba0][b]1) DESCRIPTION[/b][/color]
[/color][/b][/color][/b][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff]
[/color][color=#00ffff][color=#ffffff]Walk on the path of the true Necromancy.
This mod adds new perks to conjuration tree and new necromancy spells and powers. The goal is giving you a "logical" and satisfactory way to play a necromancer character or simply to use true necromancy spells.
As secondary effect this mod enhances NPC Necromancer's spells.
Fully compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40607/]Undeath.[/url][/color][/color][/color][b][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40607/]
[/url][/color][/color][/b][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40607/]

[/url][color=#c27ba0][b]1.1) NEW NECROMANCY PERKS & POWERS[/b][/color]

[color=#ffff00]NECROMANCY[/color]= You may raise dead (I level) and summon spirits (I level).

[color=#ffff00]LORD OF SOUL 1[/color] = You may raise dead (II level) and summon spirits (II level). 25 Magicka bonus.
[color=#ffff00]Requires Necromancy perk and 40 Conjuration[/color]
[color=#ffff00]
LORD OF SOUL 2[/color] = You may raise dead (III level) and summon spirits (III level). 50 Magicka bonus. [color=#ffff00]
Requires Lord of Souls 1 perk and 60 Conjuration[/color]
[color=#ffff00]
LORD OF SOUL 3[/color] = You may raise dead (IV level) and summon spirits (IV level). 75 Magicka bonus. [color=#ffff00]
Requires Lord of Souls 2 perk and 80 Conjuration[/color]
[color=#ffff00]
LORD OF SOUL 4[/color] = You may raise dead (V level). 100 Magicka bonus.
[color=#ffff00]Requires Lord of Souls 3 perk and 100 Conjuration

LICH CURSE 1 [/color]= 25% Disease Resist. 10% Poison Resist. 5% Frost Resist. -10% Fire Resist. -33% Health Regen. [color=#ffff00]
Requires Necromancy perk and 50 Conjuration

LICH CURSE 2[/color] = 50% Disease Resist. 20% Poison Resist. 10% Frost Resist. -20% Resist Fire. -66% Health Regen.
[color=#ffff00]Requires Lich Curse 1 and 70 Conjuration[/color]
[color=#ffff00]
LICH CURSE 3[/color] = 75% Disease Resist. 25% Poison Resist. 15% Frost Resist. -25% Fire Resist. Health doesn’t regen anymore. [color=#ffff00]
Requires Lich Curse 2 and 90 Conjuration

EVIL AURA 1[/color] = Undead, Vampires and humans up to lv. 5, if try to attack you flee away. -10 to Speech +20% Intimidation.
[color=#ffff00]Requires Necromancy perk and 30 Conjuration

EVIL AURA 2[/color] = Undead, Vampires and humans up to lv. 10, if try to attack you flee away. -20 to Speech. +40% Intimidation.
[color=#ffff00]Requires Evil Aura 1 perk and 50 Conjuration[/color]
[color=#ffff00]
EVIL AURA 3[/color] = Undead, Vampires and humans up to lv. 15, if try to attack you flee away. -30 to Speech. +60% Intimidation.
[color=#ffff00]Requires Evil Aura 2 perk and 70 Conjuration[/color]
[color=#ffff00]
EVIL AURA 4[/color] = Undead, Vampires and humans up to lv. 20, if try to attack you flee away. -40 to Speech. +80% Intimidation.
[color=#ffff00]Requires Evil Aura 3 perk and 90 Conjuration[/color]
[color=#ffff00]
DARK SLAVER 1[/color] = You may command three Undead Slaves. [color=#ffff00]
Requires Dark Souls perk and 60 Conjuration

DARK SLAVER 2[/color] = You may command four Undead Slaves. [color=#ffff00]
Requires Dark Slaver 1 perk and 80 Conjuration[/color]
[color=#ffff00]
DARK SLAVER 3[/color] = You may command five Undead Slaves. [color=#ffff00]
Requires Dark Slaver 2 perk and 100 Conjuration[/color]
[color=#ffff00]
MASTER OF DEATH[/color] = Resist 100% Disease, 50% Poison, 25% Frost. +200 Magicka. -50% Fire Resist. Health doesn’t regen anymore. Undead and humans up to level 25, if try to attack you flee away. -50 to Speech. +100% Intimidation. Command up to 10 raised Dead. [color=#ffff00]
Requires Lord of Souls 4 perk, Lich Curse 3 perk, Evil Aura 4 perk, Dark Slaver 3 perk and 100 Conjuration[/color][b]

[color=#c27ba0]
1.2) NEW NECROMANCY SPELLS[/color]
[/b]
(Lich stage I)

[color=#ffff00]Frost Cloak[/color] = Opponents that get too close take <4> points of frost damage per second. 10% Frost Resist.
[color=#ffff00](Lich Curse I perk required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Poison Cloak[/color] = Opponents that get too close take <5> points poison damage per second. 25% Poison Resis.
[color=#ffff00]Lich Curse I perk required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Dead Frost Cloak[/color] = Opponents to your undead slave that get too close take <3> points of frost damage per second. The effect is permanent.
[color=#ffff00](Lich Curse I perk and Frost Salts into dead inventory are required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Dead Poison Cloak[/color] = Opponents to your undead slave that get too close take <3> points poison damage per second. The effect is permanent[color=#ffff00].
(Lich Curse I perk and a Deathbell into dead inventory are required)[/color].


(Lich stage II)

[color=#ffff00]Frost Cloak[/color] = Opponents that get too close take <8> points of frost damage per second. 20% Frost Resist.
[color=#ffff00](Lich Curse II perk required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Poison Cloak[/color] = Opponents that get too close take <10> points poison damage per second. 50% Poison Resist.
[color=#ffff00](Lich Curse II perk required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Dead Frost Cloak[/color] = Opponents to your undead slave that get too close take <6> points of frost damage per second. The effect is permanent.
[color=#ffff00](Lich Curse II perk and Fire Salts into dead inventory are required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Dead Poison Cloak[/color] = Opponents to your undead slave that get too close take <6> points poison damage per second. The effect is permanent [color=#ffff00]
(Lich Curse II perk and a Deathbell into dead inventory are required)[/color].


(Lich stage III)

[color=#ffff00]Frost Cloak[/color] = Opponents that get too close take <12> points of frost damage per second. 30% Frost Resist.
[color=#ffff00]Lich Curse III perk required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Poison Cloak[/color] = Opponents that get too close take <15> points poison damage per second.
[color=#ffff00](Lich Curse III perk required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Dead Frost Cloak [/color]= Opponents that get too close take <12> points of frost damage per second. The effect is permanent.
[color=#ffff00](Lich Curse III perk and Fire Salts into dead inventory are required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Undead Poison Cloak[/color] = Opponents to your undead slave that get too close take <10> points poison damage per second. The effect is permanent.
[color=#ffff00](Lich Curse III perk and a Deathbell into dead inventory are required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]

Conjure Spirit I [/color]= Conjure a weak spirit to fight for you [color=#ffff00](Lord of Soul 1 required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]Conjure Spirit II[/color] = Conjure a spirit to fight for you [color=#ffff00](Lord of Soul 2 required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]Conjure Spirit III[/color] = Conjure a strong spirit to fight for you [color=#ffff00](Lord of Soul 3 required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]Conjure Spirit IV[/color] = Conjure a very strong spirit to fight for you [color=#ffff00](Lord of Soul 4 required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Raise Dead I[/color] = Raise a dead (max 10 level) to serve you for 180 sec [color=#ffff00](Necromancy perk required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]Raise Dead II[/color] = Raise a dead (max 20 level) to serve you for 240 sec [color=#ffff00](Lord of Souls I perk required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]Raise Dead III[/color] = Raise a dead (max 30 level) to serve you for 300 sec [color=#ffff00](Lord of Souls II perk required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]Raise Dead IV[/color] = Raise a dead (max 40 level) to serve you for 360 sec [color=#ffff00](Lord of Souls III perk required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]Raise Dead V[/color] = Raise a dead (max 50) permanently to serve you [color=#ffff00](Lord of Souls IV perk and a daedra heart into dead inventory are required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Rejuvenate Dead I[/color] = Give 25 health bonus to your undead slaves in the area [color=#ffff00](Evil Aura I perk required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]Rejuvenate Dead II[/color] = Give 50 health bonus to your undead slaves in the area [color=#ffff00](Evil Aura II perk required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]Rejuvenate Dead III[/color] = Give 75 health bonus to your undead slaves in the area [color=#ffff00](Evil Aura III perk required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]Rejuvenate Dead IV[/color] = Give 100 health bonus to your undead slaves in the area [color=#ffff00](Evil Aura IV perk required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Restore Health Dead I[/color] = Restore health to your undead slaves into 200 area [color=#ffff00](Evil Aura I perk required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]Restore Health Dead II[/color] = Restore health to your undead slaves into 300 area [color=#ffff00](Evil Aura II perk required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]Restore Health Dead III[/color] = Restore health to your undead slaves into 400 area [color=#ffff00](Evil Aura III perk required)[/color].
[color=#ffff00]Restore Health Dead IV[/color] = Restore health to your undead slaves into 500 area [color=#ffff00](Evil Aura IV perk required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Dead Mass Invisibility[/color] = All your Undead Slaves in the area become invisible [color=#ffff00](Conjuration 100 required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Drain Health Vortex [/color]= Drain health from your living enemies around you [color=#ffff00](Lord of the Dead perk required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Drain Magicka Vortex[/color] = Drain magicka from your living enemies around you [color=#ffff00](Lord of the Dead perk required)[/color].

[color=#ffff00]Army of Darkness[/color] = Temporarily Raise your Undead Army in the area [color=#ffff00](Lord of the Dead perk and Ritual Stone Sign are required)[/color]. You may use this spell without day limitation (as for Ritual Stone Power). Your Undead Slaves are capped to 75 level. They start with a 100 health bonus each one.


[color=#c27ba0][b]2) COMPATIBILITY[/b][/color]

Fully compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40607//?]Undeath (by Antioch08)[/url].
Fully compatible with [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9286/]Skyrim Redone (by T3nd0)[/url].
Incompatible with mods that change the conjuration perk tree.


[/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][color=#00ffff][b][color=#c27ba0]3) REQUIREMENTS[/color]

[/b][/color]Nothing[/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3].[/size][/font]

[/size][/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=#00ffff][color=#00ffff][color=#a64d79][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=violet][size=3][b][size=3][b][size=3][size=2][size=3][b][size=2][size=3][b][size=3][b]4) INSTALL WITH MOD ORGANIZER?[/b][/size][/b][/size][/size][/b][/size][size=3][b]

[/b][/size][/size][/size][/b][/size][/b][color=#ffffff][size=3][size=3][size=3](ONLY) if you have trouble try these steps:
In MO/settings/plugins/fomod, set prefer to ‘false’ instead of true. It will run the external installer and so It should works[/size][/size][/size][/color][color=#ffffff][b][size=3][b].[/b][/size][/b][/color][/size][/color][/b][/size][/font][/color][/color][/color][/b][/size][/font][/size][/font][/color][/color][/b][/size][/font][/size][/font][/size][/font]


[color=#00ffff][b][color=#c27ba0]5) CREDITS[/color]

[/b][/color]Erkeil did this mod [/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][font=Verdana][size=2][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][size=2][font=Verdana][b](you find him on google)[/b][/font][/size][/size][/font][/size][/font]. I have only fixed some annoying issues.


[b][color=violet]7) [/color][/b][/size][/font][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][color=violet][font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][color=violet][b]MODS EDITED BY ADOLPHEN [/b][/color][/size][/font][/color][/b]

author: Erkeil

files.name: Lord of the Dead Reborn
files.changelogHtml:
Now new necro spells are effectively in game. The mod finally works as intended.
Fully compatible with Skyrim Legendary Edition.
Fully compatible with USKP and USLEEP.
